title.value: Глобальные проблемы и устойчивость национальной продовольственной безопасности: в 2 кн. Кн.2
Global problems and sustainability of the national food security: in 2 volumes. Vol. 2

organization.name: Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

person.name: Ilyina, Z.M., National Academy of Sciences, Minsk (Belarus). Institute of System Studies in Agro - Industrial Complex

abstract.value: In course of the research there were studied the effectiveness and sustainability of agricultural production in the context of food security, the nature, types, and performance indicators of agricultural production, the efficiency of resource potential as the basis for sustainable agricultural development, principles for effective functioning of the national food market and stability of the national food system. The food safety forecast was realized. Forecasting methodology of balanced food markets, import substitution and food safety of the state, the basic principles and factors of foreign economic activity, the strategy of import substitution, improvement of export-import operations in agriculture, innovation and sustainability of the food market, competitive food market stability were presented.
